snippet.title: 100-Player Battle Royale Stress Test - Twitch Plays Conway's Game of Life - Battle Royale Edition
snippet.description:
Play Conway's Game of Life by typing commands in the Twitch chat: https://www.twitch.tv/bzh314
Can we handle 100 concurrent players? What would a battle royale with 100 players look like? This stress test answers these questions.
All simulated players are using Gliders (http://www.conwaylife.com/wiki/Glider) and drop them randomly on the board.

More:
* Homepage of Twitch Plays Conway's Game of Life: https://bzh314.com/twitch_plays_conway_game_of_life/
* TPCGOL is built with the Unity3d Entity Component System (ECS), Burst Compiler and C# Job System
* Play Now on #Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bzh314

#Twitch #Unity3D #Fortnite #IndieGame #GameDev
